justification: The Offering ('It's a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door.') and Interfaces ('Captain Blackbeard's ship sailed into the stormy seas.') do not reference digital twin entities, hierarchical or graph-based relationships, interactivity, or user navigation. No relevant details are provided that support the requirement.
ability: The ability to present Digital Twin entities and their hierarchical or graph-based relationships in an interactive way
